content.rendered:
A very recent release from Hibiki, that only came onto the market on 29th November 2016.

Created to celebrate the 400th anniversary of Japanese porcelain production.
The 35 year old blend is presented within a beautifully decorative handmade ceramic decanter and accompanied by a finely crafted wooden box.
One of only 150.
